title: Looking for awesome OCE created artworks!
body:
Hey guys,

Comment below with the best Oceanic League of Legends fan art you know of, whether it's yours or something you happened to come across browsing the web. Just remember to give credit to the artist if it isn't your work!

Who know's some of these artworks may even find their way onto the League of Legends Oceania Facebook. So let your friends know and get them to comment below!

**Example**

http://th03.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/i/2013/068/9/f/hecarim_by_leekent-d5xjhol.jpg

Credit - http://leekent.deviantart.com

replies.body:
Thanks for recommending me to post here! ; w ; Haven't used the new forums yet so I have really no idea how this works but HOPEFULLY DOING IT RIGHT 
uhmmm I made an album of my recentish league artsu [here](http://imgur.com/a/L2BDd#0) If anyone wants to seee.

EDIT: OHH THE IMGUR LINKS TURN INTO THUMBNAIL thingies I knew that. Ooo they work with deviantart too.
http://jayuu.deviantart.com/art/Radiant-Dawn-494744043?q=gallery%3Ajayuu%2F29297452&qo=0 http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/328/d/8/dianas_by_jayuu-d87lfw6.png http://jayuu.deviantart.com/art/Gnaaar-494710728?q=gallery%3Ajayuu%2F29297452&qo=1
http://i.imgur.com/0bQJlIe.png http://i.imgur.com/dsYcmLj.png http://i.imgur.com/ju7bCNZ.png http://i.imgur.com/Q86TSrB.png http://i.imgur.com/33To3yP.png

Oh and some of jeremy's pro artworks! 
http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2014/306/7/c/leona__the_radiant_dawn_by_goldhedgehog-d84zq7x.jpg http://fc05.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/195/6/1/diana_by_goldhedgehog-d7qmdf5.jpg

So good hehe here's his da goldhedgehog.deviantart.com
Yeah I love how the links automatically become thumbnails!
Automagically
Oh man, I've been attaching art like a muppet. Back to Boarding school for me...
so good
I love the rammus elric
Wow, great work! I like the soft style a lot.
due to popular request I present to you..
Why did you call the file "leesin2" when this picture is clearly of Jax
I think the more important question, is where is leesin1
He stayed in the fire too long and burnt more than just his eyes. We now call him Brand. (jk)

> due to popular request I present to you..

You my dear Summoner, deserve a medal!

I see someone beat me to sharing my art xD

Here's my most recent artwork. Popstar Ahri! ^_^

http://goldhedgehog.deviantart.com/art/Popstar-Ahri-495760844

And here's some more artworks I've done in the past :)

http://goldhedgehog.deviantart.com/art/Championship-Shyvana-489642383 http://goldhedgehog.deviantart.com/art/Championship-Riven-439608495 http://goldhedgehog.deviantart.com/art/Jinx-Come-on-Shoot-Faster-406756597 http://goldhedgehog.deviantart.com/art/Katarina-439802581 http://goldhedgehog.deviantart.com/art/Lulu-versus-Ziggs-445750517

Hi there, I'm new to the forums but I'd just like to share my artwork. I don't know how this works but I'll just leave a link to it on my DeviantArt. 

http://jackxyz.deviantart.com/art/Rengar-494749242

So I'm relatively new to LoL but I was a bit of an artist before and the splashes are kind of inspiring :P Anyways here are the three that I've done so far

Note: My medium is pastel hence why it's not done up all pretty on the computer :)

http://imgur.com/4V1iJCP
http://imgur.com/HK3IjRX
http://imgur.com/hw6i3rn

Is this for oce skin ideas? Kappa
Hey you Artists! I'm currently running a competition on another thread. Only the first 10 count. So get your entries in quick.
If i was artistic sure i'd post, but im not, but can create a champion lore/abilities from scratch in less than 30 minutes
